Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the purpose of the buses by stating that they were bought specifically to transport members to riots. The photo actually shows buses used by the Toronto Raptors basketball team.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the buses were not purchased by the Black Lives Matter Foundation for transporting members to riots, but were used by the Toronto Raptors.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the Black Lives Matter Foundation bought the buses for the purpose of transporting members to riots.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Black Lives Matter Foundation has not used its funds for any other purposes, such as community initiatives or supporting underprivileged individuals, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to consider the alternative explanation that the buses were not purchased by the Black Lives Matter Foundation but were used by a different organization or group.
